Summary: Searchlight toward star , then both star & searchlight disappeared.
divs: Sighting DetailsLoud music woke me, which I assumed came from a car outside. (There actually was no music from a car.) I went to 2nd floor window facing South and there appeared to be a search light on a star which came from the right of the star. I looked at it for less than a minute and the star and searchlight both disappeared. The odd thing was that later that day , I turned on my TV and the same song was playing that woke me up (Jim Croce's "Operator.")
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Aurora
There were no other sightings in Aurora on or around November 23rd 2011
